47 ICP::ICP(const Config& config) : config_(config) {}
48 
49 bool ICP::getTransformFromMatchedPoints(const PointsMatrix& src,
50  const PointsMatrix& tgt,
51  const bool refine_roll_pitch,
52  Transformation* T_tgt_src) {
53  CHECK(src.cols() == tgt.cols());
54  CHECK_NOTNULL(T_tgt_src);
55 
56  // find and remove mean
57  const Point src_center = src.rowwise().mean();
58  const Point tgt_center = tgt.rowwise().mean();
59 
60  const PointsMatrix src_demean = src.colwise() - src_center;
61  const PointsMatrix tgt_demean = tgt.colwise() - tgt_center;
62 
63  bool success;
64  Rotation R_tgt_src;
65  if (refine_roll_pitch) {
66  success =
67  getRotationFromMatchedPoints<3>(src_demean, tgt_demean, &R_tgt_src);
68  } else {
69  success =
70  getRotationFromMatchedPoints<2>(src_demean, tgt_demean, &R_tgt_src);
71  }
72 
73  const Point t_tgt_src = tgt_center - R_tgt_src.rotate(src_center);
74 
75  *T_tgt_src = Transformation(R_tgt_src, t_tgt_src);
76  return success;
77 }
78 
79 void ICP::addNormalizedPointInfo(const Point& point,
80  const Point& normalized_point_normal,
81  Vector6* info_vector) {
82  DCHECK(info_vector != nullptr);
83 
84  // add translational point information
85  info_vector->head<3>() +=
86  2.0 * normalized_point_normal.cwiseProduct(normalized_point_normal);
87  // add rotational point information (todo verify correct)
88  info_vector->tail<3>() +=
89  2.0 * Point(point.y() * point.y() * normalized_point_normal.z() *
90  normalized_point_normal.z() +
91  point.z() * point.z() * normalized_point_normal.y() *
92  normalized_point_normal.y(),
93  point.x() * point.x() * normalized_point_normal.z() *
94  normalized_point_normal.z() +
95  point.z() * point.z() * normalized_point_normal.x() *
96  normalized_point_normal.x(),
97  point.x() * point.x() * normalized_point_normal.y() *
98  normalized_point_normal.y() +
99  point.y() * point.y() * normalized_point_normal.x() *
100  normalized_point_normal.x());
101 }
102 
103 void ICP::matchPoints(const Pointcloud& points, const size_t start_idx,
104  const Transformation& T_tsdf_sensor, PointsMatrix* src,
105  PointsMatrix* tgt, Vector6* info_vector) {
106  CHECK_NOTNULL(src);
107  CHECK_NOTNULL(tgt);
108  CHECK_NOTNULL(info_vector);
109 
110  constexpr bool kInterpolateDist = false;
111  constexpr bool kInterpolateGrad = false;
112  constexpr FloatingPoint kMinGradMag = 0.1;
113 
114  src->resize(3, config_.mini_batch_size);
115  tgt->resize(3, config_.mini_batch_size);
116 
117  // epsilon to ensure we can always divide by it
118  info_vector->setConstant(kEpsilon);
119 
120  size_t idx = 0;
121  for (size_t i = start_idx;
122  i < std::min(points.size(), start_idx + config_.mini_batch_size); ++i) {
123  const Point& point_sensor = points[i];
124  const Point point_tsdf = T_tsdf_sensor * point_sensor;
125  const AnyIndex voxel_idx =
126  getGridIndexFromPoint<AnyIndex>(point_tsdf, voxel_size_inv_);
127 
128  FloatingPoint distance;
129  Point gradient;
130 
131  if (interpolator_->getDistance(point_tsdf, &distance, kInterpolateDist) &&
132  interpolator_->getGradient(point_tsdf, &gradient, kInterpolateGrad) &&
133  (gradient.squaredNorm() > kMinGradMag)) {
134  gradient.normalize();
135 
136  addNormalizedPointInfo(point_tsdf - T_tsdf_sensor.getPosition(), gradient,
137  info_vector);
138 
139  // uninterpolated distance is to the center of the voxel, as we now have
140  // the gradient we can use it to do better
141  const Point voxel_center =
142  getCenterPointFromGridIndex<AnyIndex>(voxel_idx, voxel_size_);
143  distance += gradient.dot(point_tsdf - voxel_center);
144 
145  src->col(idx) = point_tsdf;
146  tgt->col(idx) = point_tsdf - distance * gradient;
147  ++idx;
148  }
149  }
150 
151  src->conservativeResize(3, idx);
152  tgt->conservativeResize(3, idx);
153 }
154 
155 bool ICP::stepICP(const Pointcloud& points, const size_t start_idx,
156  const Transformation& inital_T_tsdf_sensor,
157  Transformation* delta_T_tsdf_sensor, Vector6* info_vector) {
158  CHECK_NOTNULL(delta_T_tsdf_sensor);
159  CHECK_NOTNULL(info_vector);
160 
161  PointsMatrix src;
162  PointsMatrix tgt;
163 
164  matchPoints(points, start_idx, inital_T_tsdf_sensor, &src, &tgt, info_vector);
165 
166  if (src.cols() < std::max(3, static_cast<int>(config_.mini_batch_size *
167  config_.min_match_ratio))) {
168  return false;
169  }
170 
171  if (!getTransformFromMatchedPoints(src, tgt, config_.refine_roll_pitch,
172  delta_T_tsdf_sensor)) {
173  return false;
174  }
175 
176  return true;
177 }
178 
179 void ICP::runThread(const Pointcloud& points,
180  Transformation* current_T_tsdf_sensor,
181  Vector6* base_info_vector, size_t* num_updates) {
182  CHECK_NOTNULL(current_T_tsdf_sensor);
183  CHECK_NOTNULL(base_info_vector);
184  CHECK_NOTNULL(num_updates);
185 
186  Transformation current_thread_T_tsdf_sensor;
187  {
188  std::lock_guard<std::mutex> lock(mutex_);
189  current_thread_T_tsdf_sensor = *current_T_tsdf_sensor;
190  }
191 
192  while (true) {
193  const size_t start_idx = atomic_idx_.fetch_add(config_.mini_batch_size);
194  if (start_idx > config_.subsample_keep_ratio * points.size()) {
195  break;
196  }
197 
198  Vector6 est_info_vector;
199  Transformation delta_T_tsdf_sensor;
200 
201  if (stepICP(points, start_idx, current_thread_T_tsdf_sensor,
202  &delta_T_tsdf_sensor, &est_info_vector)) {
203  std::lock_guard<std::mutex> lock(mutex_);
204 
205  // flip tform order
206  Transformation T_temp = delta_T_tsdf_sensor * *current_T_tsdf_sensor;
207  delta_T_tsdf_sensor = current_T_tsdf_sensor->inverse() * T_temp;
208 
209  const Vector6 weight = est_info_vector.array() /
210  (*base_info_vector + est_info_vector).array();
211  delta_T_tsdf_sensor =
212  Transformation::exp(weight.cwiseProduct(delta_T_tsdf_sensor.log()));
213 
214  *base_info_vector += est_info_vector;
215 
216  *current_T_tsdf_sensor = *current_T_tsdf_sensor * delta_T_tsdf_sensor;
217  current_thread_T_tsdf_sensor = *current_T_tsdf_sensor;
218  ++(*num_updates);
219  }
220  }
221 }
222 
223 size_t ICP::runICP(const Layer<TsdfVoxel>& tsdf_layer, const Pointcloud& points,
224  const Transformation& inital_T_tsdf_sensor,
225  Transformation* refined_T_tsdf_sensor, const unsigned seed) {
226  CHECK_NOTNULL(refined_T_tsdf_sensor);
227 
228  interpolator_ = std::make_shared<Interpolator<TsdfVoxel>>(&tsdf_layer);
229  voxel_size_ = tsdf_layer.voxel_size();
230  voxel_size_inv_ = tsdf_layer.voxel_size_inv();
231 
232  Pointcloud shuffled_points = points;
233 
234  // randomize point order
235  std::shuffle(shuffled_points.begin(), shuffled_points.end(),
236  std::default_random_engine(seed));
237 
238  *refined_T_tsdf_sensor = inital_T_tsdf_sensor;
239 
240  Vector6 base_info_vector;
241  base_info_vector.head<3>().setConstant(config_.inital_translation_weighting);
242  base_info_vector.tail<3>().setConstant(config_.inital_rotation_weighting);
243 
244  std::list<std::thread> threads;
245  atomic_idx_.store(0);
246  size_t num_updates = 0;
247 
248  for (size_t i = 0; i < config_.num_threads; ++i) {
249  threads.emplace_back(&ICP::runThread, this, shuffled_points,
250  refined_T_tsdf_sensor, &base_info_vector,
251  &num_updates);
252  }
253  for (std::thread& thread : threads) {
254  thread.join();
255  }
256 
257  interpolator_.reset();
258 
259  return num_updates;
260 }
